title: Veterinary Clinical Competency Assessment Education Program Using Virtual Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Mass casualty triage training via virtual reality simulation and enhanced mathematical decision-making modeling

learning_goals: Learners can apply mass casualty triage protocols with over 80% accuracy in a virtual reality environment.
Learners can classify priorities for clinical scenarios into no more than three tiers using a math-based decision-making model.
Learners can propose solutions to optimize resource allocation problems through team-based simulations using optimization algorithms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
